dc_description_s: This polygon shapefile contains statistics on permanent employment from the 2002 Census of Paraguay. The census information was collected by the Division de Estadistica y Censos in Paraguay between August 28 and September 12 of 2009.The original questionnaire and other supporting documentation for this census is included with this download. These data are intended for researchers, students, and policy makers for reference and mapping purposes, and may be used for basic applications such as viewing, querying, and map output production.
dc_creator_sm: Paraguay. División de Estadística y Censos
